definitions.definition: The process of imparting knowledge , skill and judgment .
examples: Good education is essential for a well-run society.

definitions.definition: Facts , skills and ideas that have been learned , especially through formal instruction .
examples: He has had a classical education .
The educations our children receive depend on their economic status.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The process of imparting knowledge , skill and judgment .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Facts , skills and ideas that have been learned , especially through formal instruction .
